column1: # IMPORTANT: Lines starting with a '#' are ignored by the game and should be used for instructions only.
# The very first row should start with "GameTitle" in the first column
column2: and your desired game title in the second column.

column1: # - The 'Round' column determines which round a clue belongs to (1 or 2).
# - A valid game can have just Round 1
# - A complete Round 1 MUST have 5 categories with values 100
# - A complete Round 2 MUST have 5 categories with values 200
# - Category names MUST be identical for all 5 clues within that category for a given round.

column2: the game will automatically switch to Round 2 after all Round 1 clues are played.

column1: # - To add a Final Jeopardy round
column2: create one row where the 'Category' is 'FINAL JEOPARDY' and the 'Round' is 'FJ'.

column1: # - To include commas in Clue or Answer text you MUST enclose the entire cell content in double quotes (e.g. "This answer is in fact correct").
# The 'DailyDouble' column determines if a clue is a Daily Double.
# - Set the value to 'Yes' to make it a Daily Double.
# - Set the value to 'No' (or leave it blank) for a normal clue.
# MediaURL is only required for 'image' or 'video' clues.
# Use a publicly accessible DIRECT URL that ends in an image extension (.jpg .png etc.).
# Standard Google Drive or Dropbox *sharing* links will usually NOT work.
# You MUST use the **EMBED URL** (the URL found inside the iframe tag when sharing/embedding a video).
